Knight-Hennessy Scholars Program

Stanford University

Application Deadline :

December 2023

Visit Website

00

DESCRIPTION

Supports exceptional graduate students pursuing a master's or doctoral degree at Stanford University across various fields.

INSTRUCTORS

  • Mr. Arladian
  • Mr. Vladimirrahman

FELLOWSHIP DETAILS

Application process: Online application, essays, letters of recommendation, and interview.

Master's or doctoral degree students

Selection criteria

Academic excellence, leadership potential, and a commitment to making a positive difference in the world.

Benefits

Full tuition and fees, living stipend, travel grants, and access to Stanford's exceptional resources and community.
